name: Aura of Faith
summary: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.
description: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power. Your Strikes deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures. Also, each good-aligned ally within 15 feet gains this benefit on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.
